Single source of truth documents enable immediate execution: Ultimate summary consolidates all validation execution information into one definitive reference, eliminating need to search across multiple documents

Complete readiness confirmation requires systematic verification: Execution plan review, ready signal review, complete package review, ultimate summary review, and complete readiness confirmation ensure no gaps before execution
